title: Maha Shivratri 2026: Best messages, quotes and images to share
description: Maha Shivratri, celebrated on February 15, is a highly auspicious Hindu festival marking Lord Shiva and Goddess Parvati's marriage. Devotees observe fasts, perform Rudra Abhishek, and offer prayers to Lord Shiva, believing wishes are granted and past karmas are cleansed. The article provides numerous greetings and messages to share, wishing for divine grace, peace, and prosperity.

title: Kane brace helps Bayern widen gap atop Bundesliga
description: Borussia Dortmund’s 4-0 victory over Mainz on February 13 drew them within three points of the league leaders but Bayern sent a clear response.

Noida: Ex-Lovers found dead in locked car, gun recovered; last whatsapp message hints at fallout
description: A man and woman were found dead from gunshot wounds inside a locked car in Noida, with police investigating a murder-suicide. A message on the man's phone suggests he killed his ex-girlfriend before taking his own life. Both families had filed missing person reports prior to the discovery.

title: Mumbai metro mishap: 5 arrested, Rs 6 crore fine imposed — what triggered the parapet failure?
description: Five individuals, including project directors and managers from RAJV-Milan Infra and DB-Hill-LBG consortium, were arrested after a Metro Line 4 parapet segment collapsed, killing one and injuring three. MMRDA imposed penalties on contractors and consultants, while politicians highlighted previous violations and safety concerns. An inquiry committee has been formed to investigate the incident.

Despite a scratchy start and vulnerabilities exposed in earlier matches, Yadav emphasized the team's ability to adapt and execute their practice, aiming to overcome pressure and deliver a strong performance against Pakistan.

title: T20 World Cup: Sahibzada vs Bumrah, Babar vs Kuldeep — Key battles in today’s India–Pak clash
description: The last time they faced each other in a T20I, Sahibzada Farhan hit Jasprit Bumrah for two sixes in a single game, becoming one of the few international batters to do so. Farhan later featured in an advertorial documentary about those shots in Dubai.

title: Bangladesh polls: BNP wants PM Modi, Saarc leaders at Tarique Rahman's oath ceremony
description: PM Modi will be invited to the swearing-in ceremony of the new govt in Bangladesh led by BNP chief Tarique Rahman, who wants to engage constructively with India. Senior BNP functionaries indicated that Pakistani PM Shehbaz Sharif and other heads of govt of Saarc countries will also be invited.

description: Rohan Chandra Bhat, accused in the murder of his parents, attended their funeral in Bengaluru. He was brought from Nimhans for the ceremony. His sister Rashmi Bhat, who flew in from the US, also participated. Rohan, appearing detached, performed rituals briefly under tight security. The family and friends expressed shock and disbelief at the tragedy.

description: Anthropic CEO Dario Amodei strongly opposes selling advanced AI chips to China, viewing them as a national security risk. He argues that while AI's economic benefits should be shared globally, critical compute power must remain out of authoritarian hands. Amodei believes this approach is crucial for maintaining global stability and preventing misuse of AI technology.

title: Team Canada rules out Brad Marchand, Josh Morrissey vs Switzerland
description: Team Canada faces Switzerland at the 2026 Winter Olympics without key players Josh Morrissey and Brad Marchand. Morrissey is sidelined with an undisclosed injury sustained against Czechia, while Marchand's absence remains unexplained. Seth Jarvis is set to make his Olympic debut, replacing Morrissey on the third line, with Travis Sanheim also stepping into the lineup.

title: Candace Owens calls claims about Erika Kirk 'absolutely vile'
description: A viral post has intensified debate over Candace Owens’ use of the term grooming in reference to a 15 year old. Critic Natly Denise accused Owens of exaggerating the situation, while Owens cited details from her own interview describing limited in person contact and online messages. The clash highlights ongoing tensions over how serious terms are defined and used in public commentary.

title: Cisco president Jeetu Patel reveals what developers company will never hire
description: Cisco's president Jeetu Patel mandates AI for all developers, aiming for half a dozen AI-coded products by 2026. This shift to spec-driven development sees human teams shrink, with AI agents tripling output. While embracing AI's potential, Cisco is investing heavily in security to prevent rogue agents, urging developers to master AI to stay relevant.
